participant_1.name: Buse
participant_1.personality: Buse is ambitious and determined, often seeking validation in her career choices. She has a passion for fashion and luxury items, which reflects her desire for success.
participant_1.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Lee
participant_2.personality: Lee is practical and down-to-earth, enjoying hands-on work. He has a nurturing side, evident in his love for gardening, but carries a fear from his childhood that affects his social interactions.
participant_2.background: i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.
